name: provectus-marketplace
description: ProAgent Plugin Marketplace — practice-specific plugins for Provectus teams, built from 843 assets across 17 repositories
author: diegouis

plugins.name: proagent-agentic-engineering
plugins.description: Building, orchestrating, and optimizing AI agent systems with Claude Code extensions, MCP servers, multi-agent workflows, and prompt engineering

plugins.name: proagent-sdlc
plugins.description: Managing Software Development Lifecycle — architecture, code review, testing strategy, release management, documentation, and git workflows

plugins.name: proagent-platform
plugins.description: Building Developer Platforms & Tooling — service catalogs, golden paths, scaffolding, MCP server development, and DX optimization

plugins.name: proagent-devops
plugins.description: Managing Infrastructure & Deployments — CI/CD pipelines, Docker/Kubernetes, Terraform/IaC, monitoring, incident response, and cloud operations

plugins.name: proagent-qa
plugins.description: Ensuring Software Quality — test automation, Playwright/Cypress, regression testing, coverage analysis, E2E testing, and accessibility

plugins.name: proagent-backend
plugins.description: Building Scalable Backend Services — APIs, databases, microservices, auth, caching, queues, and performance optimization

plugins.name: proagent-frontend
plugins.description: Building Modern Web Interfaces — React/Vue/Angular, design systems, accessibility (WCAG 2.1 AA), responsive design, and performance optimization

plugins.name: proagent-delivery
plugins.description: Managing Project Delivery — sprint planning, milestones, status reports, risk management, stakeholder communication, and retrospectives

plugins.name: proagent-security
plugins.description: Securing Software & Infrastructure — vulnerability scanning, compliance, secrets management, threat modeling, OWASP, and Zero Trust

plugins.name: proagent-data
plugins.description: Engineering Data Pipelines & Analytics — ETL/ELT, dbt, Airflow, data warehousing, SQL optimization, and data quality

plugins.name: proagent-ml-ai
plugins.description: Building ML & AI Systems — model training, MLOps, experiment tracking, LLM applications, RAG, embeddings, and deployment

plugins.name: proagent-hr
plugins.description: Managing Human Resources & Talent — hiring, interviews, onboarding, performance reviews, compensation, employee development, and CV validation at scale with multi-agent orchestration and blind review

plugins.name: proagent-sales
plugins.description: Driving Sales & Business Development — proposals, RFPs, competitive analysis, lead research, pipeline management, and quote generation

plugins.name: proagent-finance
plugins.description: Managing Financial Operations — budgeting, invoicing, forecasting, P&L analysis, cost optimization, and financial reporting

plugins.name: proagent-router
plugins.description: Provectus Practice Router — single /proagent command that detects the domain from user input and dispatches to the appropriate practice specialist across all 15 plugins

plugins.name: proagent-documentation
plugins.description: Cross-platform repository documentation and Confluence publishing â€” analyze GitHub/GitLab repos, generate docs, publish and sync Confluence pages

mcp_servers_core.name: slack
mcp_servers_core.description: Slack workspace access — channels, messages, users, threads

mcp_servers_core.name: google-drive
mcp_servers_core.description: Google Drive files, Docs (Markdown), Sheets (CSV), Slides (text)

mcp_servers_core.name: google-workspace
mcp_servers_core.description: Gmail (list, search, send, draft) and Google Calendar (events, scheduling)

mcp_servers_core.name: github
mcp_servers_core.description: Repositories, PRs, issues, Actions, code search

mcp_servers_core.name: excalidraw
mcp_servers_core.description: Interactive visual diagramming — renders Excalidraw canvases directly in chat via natural language prompts

mcp_servers_additional.name: rube
mcp_servers_additional.description: Composio SaaS gateway — 200+ apps via RUBE_SEARCH_TOOLS, RUBE_MANAGE_CONNECTIONS, RUBE_MULTI_EXECUTE_TOOL
